general.gigTitle: design and develop customised website for your business

sellerCard.description: I am Shahroz Khalid, a certified and highly experienced software engineer specialised in mobile app develoment for Android and iOS, Hybrid Apps using Flutter, as well as Web Development. With a strong background in Computer Science I have Bechelor's degree in Software Engineering and a proven tract record of 100 plus successful mobile apps for android and iOS. My client's satisfaction is evident in the consistent five star reviews I have received for my work. Do not settle for anything less than the best. Contact me today to bring your dream mobile app to life. Thanks

description.content:
Welcome to My Profile!

Greetings,

I am offering Web development service in this gig .I can design and develop any complex and totally customised flutter web for you to boost your business and to attract more users to your platform.


If You are looking for an attractive and outstanding Website fully responsive to all the devices and customized to your need, then you are at right place.


I am Shahroz, Well experienced software engineer with over five years of comprehensive experience in both industrial and freelance capacities. Throughout my career, I've successfully developed and delivered more than a hundred web and mobile applications, solidifying my reputation as a reliable and proficient professional in the field of technology.


Incase you are not clear at the requirements, you can ping me for a zoom meeting upon your convenience so that I would be able to assist you at my best.


Best regards 

Software Engineer Shahroz Mirza.

openGraph.title: design and develop customised website for your business

reviews.comment: Shahroz is a great teacher and goes above and beyond to offer additional help outside the regular meeting times.

seller_response.comment: Glad to know that, thanks Noah

reviews.comment: Was very impressed with my first lesson - Shahroz took extra time to ensure that I could get the system running after we did some practice coding, he was very flexible in terms of scheduling, explained basic concepts well, and was extremely careful at every step to make sure I understood everything.

seller_response.comment: Glad to know that, Thankyou very much

reviews.comment: I strongly suggest Shahroz if you need a knowledgeable professional.  Exceptional job
There is no person on Fiver I could recommend as I would Shahroz. I wish to him never to change, to stay polite as he is now. My recommendations for this young men.

seller_response.comment:
It a great pleasure to hear this from one of my best clients.
thank you very much.
